amendment.description: To eliminate coverage under the Medicare and Medicaid programs for drugs when used for treatment of erectile dysfunction.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1894 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1894 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S10696; text: CR S10696) To eliminate coverage under the Medicare and Medicaid programs for drugs when used for treatment of erectile dysfunction.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1894 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Grassley.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1894 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
